---
title: "Base distribution in the polya region"
---
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(GenomicRanges)
library(Biostrings)
library(Rsamtools)
library(ggseqlogo)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```
Get the genome
```{r}
fasta_path <- "~/Documents/Ref_data/TAIR10_chr_all.fas"
```

```{r}
piled_up_results <- "bed/piled_results.tsv"
sites <-fread(piled_up_results)
head(sites)
```
```{r}
region_width = 200

# Define a start and end around each position
center_pos <- as.numeric(sites$win_start)

# Make GRanges object centered at position with Â±5 bp
flanked_gr <- GRanges(
  seqnames = paste0("Chr", sites$chrom),
  ranges = IRanges(start = center_pos - region_width, end = center_pos + region_width),
  strand = sites$strand
)
# Load genome and extract sequences
At.genome <- FaFile(fasta_path)
sequences <- getSeq(At.genome, flanked_gr)
sites$sequences <- as.character(sequences)
head(sites)
```
```{r}
rna_sequences <- gsub("T", "U", sites$sequences)
get_middle <- function(seq) {
  n <- nchar(seq)
  mid <- ceiling(n / 2)
  substr(seq, mid - 25, mid + 10)
}
# Apply to all sequences
rna_middle <- vapply(rna_sequences, get_middle, FUN.VALUE = character(1))
weights <- sites$count_sum
ggseqlogo(rna_middle, seq_type = 'rna', weights = weights)
```

```{r}
# Step 1: reverse complement for '-' strand
sites[, sequence_for_logo := ifelse(
  strand == "-",
  as.character(reverseComplement(DNAStringSet(sequences))),
  sequences
)]
# Step 2: Replace T with U
sites[, rna_sequence := gsub("T", "U", sequence_for_logo)]
# Step 3: Split into individual bases by position
seq_split <- sites[, .(rna_sequence, count_sum)][
  , .(pos = 1:nchar(rna_sequence[[1]]), base = strsplit(rna_sequence, "")[[1]]), 
  by = .(rna_sequence, count_sum)
]
# Step 4: Expand to all positions
seq_long <- seq_split[, .(pos, base, count_sum)]
# Step 5: Summarize weighted base counts per position
base_counts <- seq_long[, .(weighted_count = sum(count_sum)), by = .(pos, base)]
# Step 6: Normalize to percentages
base_freqs <- base_counts[, .(base, pct = weighted_count / sum(weighted_count) * 100), by = pos]
# Step 7: Plot
ggplot(base_freqs, aes(x = pos, y = pct, color = base)) +
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  labs(x = "Position in sequence", y = "Base frequency (%)") +
  theme_minimal()
```

sites[, rna_sequence := gsub("T", "U", sequence_for_logo)]
# Step 3: Split each sequence into one row per base with its position
seq_split <- sites[, .(rna_sequence)][
  , .(pos = seq_len(nchar(rna_sequence[[1]])), 
      base = strsplit(rna_sequence, "")[[1]]), 
  by = rna_sequence
]
# Step 4: Count base occurrences at each position (unweighted)
base_counts <- seq_split[, .N, by = .(pos, base)]
# Step 5: Normalize to percentages
base_freqs <- base_counts[, .(base, pct = N / sum(N) * 100), by = pos]
# Step 6: Plot
ggplot(base_freqs, aes(x = pos, y = pct, color = base)) +
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  labs(x = "Position in sequence", y = "Base frequency (%)") +
  theme_minimal()
